required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Is There a Relationship Between the Risk of Injury and Posture in Wrestlers?
clinical_study.official_title: Is There a Relationship Between the Risk of Injury and Posture in Wrestlers?

brief_summary.textblock: This study was planned to investigate the relationship between the risk of injury and posture in wrestlers. The study will be included male wrestlers. The spine posture and flexibility of the athletes will be measured during standing position with the Idiag M360® brand Spinal Mouse (SM), while the overall body posture will be measured from the anterior and lateral sides using the New York Posture Analysis Method (NYPAM). Injury risks of the athletes will be evaluated by Functional Movement Screen (FMS) which was consisting of seven basic movement patterns.

primary_outcome.description: Posture will be assessed with New York Posture Rating Chart (NYPR) originally published in 1958
Sagittal spinal alignment and mobility will be measured using the Spinal Mouse (IdiagAG Mülistrasse 18 CH-8320 Fehraltorf, Switzerland), a computer-aided, non-invasive device
Injury risk will be evaluated with Functional Movement Screen (FMS) test battery. A previous systematic review has demonstrated acceptable reliability for the FMS

arm_group.description: Posture will be assessed with New York Posture Rating Chart (NYPR) originally published in 1958
Sagittal spinal alignment and mobility will be measured using the Spinal Mouse (IdiagAG Mülistrasse 18 CH-8320 Fehraltorf, Switzerland), a computer-aided, non-invasive device.
Injury risk will be evaluated with Functional Movement Screen (FMS) test battery. A previous systematic review has demonstrated acceptable reliability for the FMS

study_pop.textblock: In this cross-sectional study, 18- to 40-year-old elite wrestler who have won medals in their championships from four different clubs will be tested

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Being between the ages of 18 and 40
- To be a professional wrestler who won medals in the Turkey championships
Exclusion Criteria:
- had injury for in the last 6 months
- had a history of surgery, or chronic and progressive disease
- had any orthopaedic or neurological problems

facility.name: Ankara Yıldırım Beyazıt University, Faculty of Health Sciences, Department of Physiotherapy and Rehabilitation
